subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: On Saturday night, Isiah Thomas began a postgame interview with a rant about the referees’ treatment of Stephon Marbury. The commissioner’s office responded with a $50,000 fine Tuesday.
snippet: On Saturday night, Isiah Thomas began a postgame interview with a rant about the referees’ treatment of Stephon Marbury. The commissioner’s office responded with a $50,000 fine Tuesday.
